name: claim_airdrop
attributes: # [doc = " エアドロップを請求するが、"]
# [doc = " claim_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let claim = & mut ctx . accounts . claim_account ;
let amount = ctx . accounts . config . airdrop_amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . airdrop_vault . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;

fields.name: claim_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付けて所有者一致を検証すべき"]

fields.name: airdrop_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エアドロップ用プールアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エアドロップを受け取るユーザー（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " エアドロップ量設定を保持するアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来この請求を行うユーザーの Pubkey"]
